title: CSS Frameworks
intro: Comparison and implementation of modern CSS frameworks.
description: This project explores different CSS frameworks with focus on structure, scalability and maintainability. Decisions are documented and compared based on real use cases.

title: JavaScript Frameworks
description: An exploration of JavaScript frameworks with focus on component structure, state handling and developer experience.

title: Semester Project 2
description: A full project combining design, API integration and interaction, built with a real-world mindset.
